short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shadow is your self-custodial web3 wallet for DeFi & NFTs. Buy & Send tokens on Sui.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shadow is your Web3 wallet on Sui blockchain.

Key Features:
• Easily interact with Sui dApps using the latest SDKs
• Manage multiple addresses on Sui effortlessly
• No limits on tokens, balances, or transactions
• Your funds are under your control
• No personal information required

Install Shadow and start exploring Web3 on Sui today.
